body.p:
Mt Vernon Ky
Oct 7th 1863.
Gov T E, Bramlett
Dr Sir a letter was Recd stating the amt iof my fine was not stated in petition. I confessed Judgment, the amt was put at $20.
Hope you will relieve me as Judge & commonwealth atty avised me to petition -- your honor, as the fine is hard upon me as well as unfortunate,

I am most Respectfully
Albert Owens
